file.name: path-item-object-parameters-unsupported-parameter.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Unsupported Parameter Components
paths:
  /pets:
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authParam'
    get:
      summary: List all pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A paged array of pets
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
components:
  parameters:
    authParam:
      name: Authorization
      in: cookie

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "authParam": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
